application.name: IPTWeather
application.description:
IPTWeather brings weather to iPhoneToday and/or S2U2.
Download and support at http://iptweather.googlecode.com
What's new in IPTWeather_20100415:
- IPTWeather can now be installed in any directory.
- Installation cab for scripts. You still have to configure manually the weather.ini file and to download icon/wallpaper sets.
